snippet: After almost eight years, a case involving terrorist watch lists is going to court.
abstract: News analysis; suit filed by Stanford University PhD student Rahinah Ibrahim challenging the United States government's main terrorist watch list is finally going to trial, after almost eight years of wrangling; case may signal a change to the secrecy surrounding the lists, as well as the difficult process of challenging one's inclusion on the list.
lead_paragraph: After almost eight years, a case involving terrorist watch lists is going to court.

headline.main: Who Is Watching the Watch Lists?
headline.print_headline: Who Is Watching the Watch Lists?
